io.sphere.sdk.states

Interface State

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CreationTimestamped, DefaultModel<State>, DefaultModelView<State>, Identifiable<State>, Referenceable<State>, Timestamped, Versioned<State>

    public interface State
extends DefaultModel<State>
    A State represents a state of a particular entity (defines a finite state machine). States can be combined together by defining transitions between each state, thus allowing to create work-flows. Each project has by default an initial LineItemState (inherited also by custom Line Items)

    Operations:

    • Create a state with StateCreateCommand.
    • Fetch a state by key with StateByKeyFetch.
    • Query a state with StateQuery.
    • Delete a channel with StateDeleteCommand.
